event: On 1 January 2020, Israeli forces opened fire at a Palestinian attempting to carry out a stabbing attack, armed with a knife on route 60, near Gush Etzion. The Palestinian was detained and hospitalized. There were no reports of injuries to security forces.

On 2 January 2020, Israeli police forces assaulted Palestinian Muslim worshippers during their storming of Bab Al Rahmah in Al Aqsa mosque in Al Quds - Old City (Al Quds) and removed them from the mosque after spraying pepper spray at the Palestinians. There were no fatalities.
On 6 January 2020, Israeli forces opened fire at unidentified armed Palestinians near Tulkarm (Tulkarm, West Bank) as they were travelling inside Israeli borders. No casualties occurred.
On 12 January 2020, two men were seriously wounded in a shooting in Nahariyya in northern Israel, by an unidentified armed people. Circumstances of shooting are unknown.
On 14 January 2020, an Israeli settler ran over and injured a Palestinian student in Kisan village (Bethlehem) while she was on her way to school.
On 15 January 2020, Israeli warplanes launched six missiles at positions of unidentified armed Palestinians west of Bayt Lahya town (North Gaza). There were no casualties.

On 16 January 2020, Israeli forces helicopter struck infrastructure used for underground activities by Hamas in the northern Gaza Strip for a second day reportedly in response to incendiary balloons launched from the strip. No reported injuries or fatalities.
On 17 January 2020, a booby-trapped balloon fired by an unidentified Palestinian group from Gaza exploded in Nahal Oz (Ashqelon, HaDarom). There were no casualties.
On 18 January 2020, an armed Palestinian man stabbed and moderately wounded an Israeli man near Hebron city (West Bank). The assailant was arrested shortly thereafter.
On 19 January 2020, incendiary balloons launched from the Gaza Strip exploded in Sderot, near the Gaza border. No injuries were reported.

On 21 January 2020, a plane model holding booby-trapped balloons, most likely launched from Gaza, fell west of Dimona (Beer Sheva, HaDarom). Bomb defusal units arrived to defuse the explosives. There were no casualties.
On 24 January 2020, an unidentified Palestinian group opened fire at an Israeli military vehicle that raided Al Zahra neighborhood in Jenin (Jenin, West Bank). There were no casualties.

Late on 25 January 2020, Israeli aircrafts targeted several Hamas facilities in the Gaza Strip, in retaliation to incendiary balloons launched from Gaza. A weapons facility was targeted. Explosions were heard near Khan Yunis.
On 26 January 2020, a rocket was fired from Gaza into Israel and landed in an open field in southern Israel. An exact location as to where the rocket fell was not reported.
On 28 January 2020, Israeli forces opened fire at positions of unidentified armed Palestinians east of Al Burayj camp (Deir El Balah). There were no casualties.
On 29 January 2020, Israeli forces opened fire at positions of unidentified armed Palestinians east of Khan Yunis city (Khan Yunis). There were no casualties.

On 30 January 2020, three rockets were launched into southern Israel from the Gaza Strip. Sirens were heard near the Sapir College in Sderot (Ashqelon, Hadarom) and in Nir Am in Shaar Hanegev Regional Council. One rocket landed in an open area near Sderot, while the other two were intercepted. No damage or injuries were reported.

On 31 January 2020, Israeli aircrafts targeted several Hamas positions in the Gaza Strip, in retaliation the rockets fired at Israel a day before. Explosions were heard near Khan Yunis and Rafah. An underground weapons production site was hit. One site targeted was in Al Burayj
source: Arutz Sheva; BBC News; MidEast Mirror

event: On 1 February 2020, Israeli aircrafts bombed a Hamas position (a land) northeast of Gaza City. No injuries were reported.
As reported on February 2, a rocket was launched from Gaza into Israel and exploded in an open field in Nahal Oz. No injuries were reported.
On 3 February 2020, at least nine incendiary balloons were launched from Gaza into southern Israel. Three balloons landed in the Eshkol Regional Council, and one exploded without causing any damage.
On 4 February 2020, three rockets were fired from Gaza into southern Israel and exploded in open fields. Sirens sounded in Netivot and no injuries were reported.

On 5 February 2020, an Israeli reconnaissance plane fired a missile at a site belonging to the Al-Qassam Brigades (armed wing of Hamas), in the city of Khan Yunis in the southern Gaza Strip. Later warplanes returned and fired 4 additional missiles. No injuries were reported.

On 6 February 2020, a drive-by shooting by a Palestinian assailant lightly injured an Israeli soldier near the settlement of Dolev (Ramallah and Al Bireh, West Bank). The assailant fled the scene immediately following the attack.
On 7 February 2020, Israeli forces opened fire at a Hamas soldier near Jabalya and severely injured him.
On 8 February 2020, Israeli tanks shelled two Hamas positions in the northern Gaza Strip in retaliation to a projectile fired at Israel earlier. No injuries were reported.
On 9 February 2020, a missile was fired from the Gaza Strip into Israel and triggered sirens in Sderot. The Shaar Hanegev Regional Council reported that the rocket landed in an open field.

On 10 February 2020, Israeli warplanes bombed Palestinian resistance sites in the Gaza Strip, in retaliation to rockets and incendiary balloons fired at Israel. Warplanes bombed the new port belonging to the al Qassam Brigades (military wing of Hamas) west of Khan Yunis with at least one missile and incurred damage. No injuries were reported.
On 11 February 2020, a rocket was launched from the Gaza Strip towards southern Israel, landing in the area of Shaar Hanegev (Ashqelon, HaDarom). The rocket exploded but did not cause any damage.
On 12 February 2020, booby trapped balloons launched from Gaza exploded mid-air over Ashqelon (Ashqelon, HaDarom). There were no casualties.
On 13 February 2020, an incendiary balloon that was launched from the Gaza Strip into Israel exploded over the Sdot Negev Community. No injuries of damage were reported.
On 14 February 2020, several booby-trapped balloons launched from Gaza landed in Netivot (Beer Sheva, HaDarom). There were no casualties.

On 15 February 2020, an unidentified Palestinian group clashed with Fatah militants after they opened fire at their headquarters in Balata Camp (Nablus, West Bank), presumably to target the Fatah committee elections. 1 militant was injured.
On 16 February 2020, an unidentified Palestinian group launched anti-aircraft missiles at Israeli warplanes flying over Rafah (Rafah, Gaza Strip). There were no casualties.

On 17 February 2020, an armed Palestinian attempted to stab an Israeli soldier at the Cave of Patriarchs in Hebron city (West Bank) before being subdued and arrested. No Israeli soldiers were injured in the attack.

On 18 February 2020, an unidentified Palestinian group clashed with Palestinian forces in Qabatiyah (Jenin, West Bank) as they were dispersing a reception ceremony for an ex-detainee. 3 Palestinians were injured during the clashes. One of them succumbed to their wounds later.

Overnight between February 18 and 19, clashes broke out between Palestinian forces and armed residents in the village of Qabatiya. During a celebration for the release of a resident from Israeli prison, locals wanted to fire into the air but were prevented by Palestinian security forces and clashes erupted. 2 residents and 1 Palestinian Officer were injured and a 17 year old who was shot in the chest, died of his wounds.

On 20 February 2020, a Palestinian was shot and wounded by Israeli forces when he allegedly sped up while driving his car towards a newly set-up checkpoint in the village of Baytin in Ramallah. Israeli media reported it to have been a possible ramming attack. No soldiers were injured.

On 21 February 2020, an armed Palestinian attempted to stab an Israeli civilian in Al Quds - East Talpiyyot (Al Quds, West Bank). A bystander prevented the attack and subdued the assailant until police showed up.

On 22 February 2020, Israeli Border Police shot dead a Palestinian who allegedly ran towards them with a knife, and did not respond to their calls to stop, at the Bab al Absat (Lion's gate) in Al Quds - Old City (Al Quds, West Bank). A nearby woman was injured by shrapnel and hospitalized.

On 23 February 2020, approximately 30 rockets and mortar shells were fired by the PIJ at Israel from the Gaza Strip. In Ashqelon a piece of shrapnel from an intercepted rocket damaged a car and sirens were heard in the City. The attack came after a PIJ member was shot and killed by Israeli soldiers.

On 24 February 2020, approximately 50 rockets and mortar shells were fired by the PIJ at Israel from the Gaza Strip. A mortar fell inside a town in the Eshkol Regional Council and caused some damages. No injuries were reported. The attack came after a PIJ member was shot and killed by Israeli soldiers on Sunday.

On 26 February 2020, an unidentified Palestinian group opened fire at a Palestinian ex-detainee and activist, and his son, near the Nablus municipality building in Nablus (Nablus, West Bank), hitting him directly and injuring him. Palestinian security forces went after the attackers, and arrested all but one of them.

On the night from February 27 to February 28, dozens of Israeli Settlers stormed the Palestinian village of Huwwarah and slashed the tyres of 20 vehicles. Settlers opened fire at Palestinian homes and shops in the town. Israeli forces in turn, opened fire at Palestinians who tried to fend off Settlers. No injuries were reported.
source: Arab 48; Palestine News and Information Agency

event: On 1 March 2020, an unidentified Palestinian group from Gaza launched a missile towards nearby Israeli towns. Coded to Beersheba (Beer Sheva, HaDarom). There were no casualties.
On 3 March 2020, Israeli forces opened fire at positions of unidentified armed Palestinians north of Bayt Lahya (North Gaza). There were no casualties.
On 6 March 2020, an unidentified Palestinian group from Gaza launched a missile that landed near the border fence of Gaza (Gaza City, Gaza Strip). There were no injuries.
On 8 March 2020, Israeli forces opened fire at positions of unidentified armed Palestinians east of Mukhayyam al Magazi (Deir El Balah). There were no casualties.

On 9 March 2020, Israeli settlers opened fire randomly at Palestinians in At Tirah (Ramallah and Al Bireh). Israeli forces also fired rubber-coated metal bullets, stun grenades, and tear gas canisters at Palestinians who tried to confront [presumably verbally] the settlers. There were no fatalities.

On 10 March 2020, three armed Israeli Settlers approached a Palestinian family in their car in Turmus Ayya, north of Ramallah and beat them with their riffle butts and smashed the car. One of the Palestinians pushed a Settler, and then they were threatened by gunfire. Settlers then started breaking the car windows and tried to take two of the Palestinian children in the car with them.
On 11 March 2020, Israeli forces opened fire at positions of unidentified armed Palestinians east of Bayt Hanun (North Gaza). There were no casualties.

On 13 March 2020, an unidentified Palestinian group opened fire at an Israeli settler vehicle near Ramallah (Ramallah and Al Bireh, West Bank) hitting their vehicle with 12 bullets. No casualties occurred.

On 15 March 2020, when more than 25 Israeli Settlers stormed the town of Huwwara, south of Nablus and damaged vehicles, they also randomly opened fire on Palestinian residents, and shepherds, whose sheep they attempted to steal. No injuries were reported. The attack came 4 days after an Israeli was injured by Palestinian rock-throwing in the area.

On 23 March 2020, two Palestinian farmers were assaulted by rock throwing from a group of 18 armed Israeli Settlers in the village of Burqa north of Nablus. Settlers then punctured the tyres of the Palestinians' vehicle, and smashed it's windows.
On 25 March 2020, Israeli settlers from Maon settlement attacked Palestinian farmers and opened fire at them near At Tuwani (Hebron). There were no casualties.
On 27 March 2020, Israeli forces launched an artillery attack at unidentified armed Palestinians east of Bayt Hanun (North Gaza). There were no fatalities.
On 28 March 2020, the head of the Nasariyya Village Council was shot and killed by unidentified gunmen in the village of an Nassariya in the Nablus Governorate late Saturday night.
On 30 March 2020, an unidentified Palestinian group opened fire at Israeli military forces that raided Al Quds - Shuafat Camp (Al Quds, West Bank). No casualties occurred.
On 31 March 2020, an Israeli settler randomly opened fire at Palestinians in the Mofia area near Al Hadidiyah (Tubas) while driving his vehicle in the area. There were no fatalities.

On 1 April 2020, police forces physically assaulted two Arab Israelis in Jaffa after they broke the emergency laws the government imposed on citizens to curb the spread of the coronavirus epidemic. No injuries were reported.

On 2 April 2020, Palestinian preventive security forces, accompanied by family members of a Palestinian military officer, opened fire at shops in Bayt Liqya (Ramallah and Al Bireh, West Bank) after a group assaulted a Palestinian military officer. They also randomly assaulted pedestrians.
On 3 April 2020, Israeli forces opened fire at unidentified armed Palestinians east of Mukhayyam al Magazi (Deir El Balah). There were no casualties.

On 4 April 2020, unknown gunmen shot at the building of the 'Front' (Jebah/Hadash) in the town of Sakhnin as members were in the process of preparing food parcels for those in need during the coronavirus outbreak. No injuries were reported.

On 7 April 2020, a group of 10 armed Israeli Settlers from the Halamish Settlement beat a Palestinian farmer and his two sons while they were ploughing lands in the village of Kobar. Settlers then kidnapped the two sons.
On 8 April 2020, unknown gunmen opened fire at Palestinian security forces, in Nablus city. No casualties reported by source.

Around 11 April 2020 (as reported), the health condition of a Palestinian prisoner in the Israeli Ramon in Mitzpe Ramon detention centre is deteriorating as a result of the physically abusive investigations he underwent in the prison. It was reported that he suffers from severe headaches, hearing loss and has yet to be transferred for treatment.

On 13 April 2020, a man of Arab ethnicity armed with a wire cutter and a knife, entered an Israeli military base in Mishmar Hanegev, near the city of Rahat. As he entered the base, he was instructed to stop, but he continued and attacked the soldiers before he escaped. Two soldiers were lightly wounded.
On 14 April 2020, Israeli forces opened fire at positions of unidentified armed Palestinians east of Dayr al Balah (Deir El Balah). There were no casualties.
On 18 April 2020, Israeli settlers opened fire randomly at 2 Palestinians in Pesagot settlement (Ramallah and Al Bireh). There were no fatalities.
On 19 April 2020, Israeli forces opened fire at positions of unidentified armed Palestinians east of Dayr al Balah (Deir El Balah). There were no casualties.

On 22 April 2020, a Palestinian was killed after he stabbed a border police officer at the Kiosk checkpoint near the Al Quds - Maale Adumim Settlement near Jerusalem. It was reported that the Palestinian in a car ramming attack hit the officer, then stabbed him and was shot by nearby guards. The Palestinian was also in possession of a pipe bomb.
On 23 April 2020, Israeli settlers opened fire randomly near the emergency checkpoint at the entrance of Kisan village (Bethlehem). There were no fatalities.

On 24 April 2020, an unidentified Palestinian ran over a Palestinian national guard officer near the Orthodox Club in Bayt Jala (Bethlehem, West Bank). The reason was not mentioned. Palestinian forces arrested the attacker.

Around 27 April 2020, Israeli residents of Lod reported that several incendiary balloons and dozens of fireworks have been launched from the Gaza Strip into Israel since the start of Ramadan. The incendiary balloons reportedly landed in three locations, one of which was near the Ben Gurion Airport. No injuries or damages were reported.

On 28 April 2020, an Israeli woman was stabbed and lightly injured by a Palestinian assailant outside of Mall G in the town of Kfar Saba (Petah Tiqwa, HaMerkaz). The attacker [from Tulkarm] was shot and moderately wounded by an armed bystander at the scene of the attack. The motivation for the stabbing is unknown.

On 29 April 2020, a Palestinian in his car sped up before a checkpoint in Umm al Rehan and crashed into a post. The Palestinian reportedly stated that he attempted to 'carry out an attack and wanted to die' after he was arrested. No injuries were reported. A reason for the attack is unknown.
On 30 April 2020, Israeli military forces shelled a Hamas military post, in Shujaayah neighbourhood of Gaza city. No casualties reported by source.
On 2 May 2020, Palestinian police forces attacked a Palestinian journalist during a press brief in front of the Palestinian prime minister's office in Ramallah (Ramallah and Al Bireh, West Bank).
On 6 May 2020, Israeli artillery shelled a monitoring site belonging to an unidentified Palestinian armed group south of Al Burayj refugee camp (Deir El Balah, Gaza Strip). No injuries were reported.
On 7 May 2020, an Israeli settler assaulted and unleashed his dog at a Palestinian bus driver near Pisgat Zeev (Al Quds, West Bank). As a result the bus driver was seriously injured.
source: PCHR: Palestinian Centre for Human Rights

event: On 12 May 2020, Israeli forces shot, injured and then detained a Palestinian at the Qalandia checkpoint between Jerusalem and Ramallah under the pretext that it was attempting to carry out a stabbing attack against a Police officer at the checkpoint. Israeli forces then closed the checkpoint. Israeli medics said the Palestinian was wounded in the foot, but other reports described his injuries as serious. No other injuries were reported.

On 14 May 2020, Israeli forces shot dead 1 Palestinian at the entrance to the Negohot Settlement near Fuqeiqis south of Hebron, after he carried out a car-ramming attack that moderately injured an Israeli soldier. Later that day, Israeli forces opened fire at 1 Palestinian vehicle near the north entrance of Bayt Ummar (Hebron) and killed its driver claiming that he had run over an Israeli soldier. The event likely occurred in two locations.
source: Al Ghad (Jordan); PLO Negotiations Affairs Department

event: On 15 May 2020, Palestinian forces physically assaulted a Palestinian journalist while he was with his sister and her husband, after being stopped by a patrol car in Anabta (Tulkarm, West Bank), under the pretext that there were 10 individuals in the vehicle. Police forces arrested the journalist and took him to the Tulkarm precinct.
On 17 May 2020, Israeli soldiers shot and injured a Lebanese citizen who had crossed the border into Israel illegally.
On 18 May 2020, Israeli settlers stabbed with a knife a Palestinian child in Al Quds - Old City (Al Quds) and left him hospitalized.
On 19 May 2020, an Israeli settler attacked and injured a Palestinian civilian with a knife on Jaffa street in Jerusalem city (Jerusalem).

On 20 May 2020, a Palestinian attempted to fire at a car carrying Israeli Settlers near the town of Huwwarah, but the trigger was jammed and he did not fire his weapon. The Israeli driver then chased him off and fired shots into the air. The Palestinian was later identified as a Palestinian Police officer. No one was injured.

On 23 May 2020, Israeli settlers armed with steel bars assaulted two Palestinians in Al Sahlat area in the old city of Hebron (coded to Hebron - Bab az Zawiyah) and left them hospitalized with contusions.

On 24 May 2020, Israeli Settlers from the Yitzhar Settlement opened fire at a Park in the village of Huwwarah and attempted to vandalize it, but were warded off by Palestinian residents. There are no reports of clashes.

On 25 May 2020, a Palestinian was shot and severely injured in the neighborhood of Al Quds - East Talpiyyot (Al Quds, West Bank) after he allegedly attempted to carry out a stabbing attack on Border Police officers. No officers were injured.

On 29 May 2020, a Palestinian was shot dead by Israeli forces after allegedly attempting to carry out a car ramming attack against Israeli soldiers near the village of An Nabi Salih northeast of Ramallah. No soldiers were injured. Eye witnesses have reported that soldiers opened fire on the vehicle being driven without knowing where it was headed

On 30 May 2020, Israeli military forces opened fire at a Palestinian riding a motorcycle near Bethlehem (West Bank) on suspicion that he was just running over a soldier and injuring him. The conditions of the Palestinian were not indicated in the source.

On 1 June 2020, two Israeli settlers from the Suseya settlement attacked and beat a Palestinian at gunpoint near Yuta (Hebron, West Bank). Israeli police forces arrived at the scene and detained the Palestinian.
source: PCHR: Palestinian Centre for Human Rights

event: On 2 June 2020, an Israeli settler driving his vehicle along the main road connecting Qalqilya and Nablus ran over a Palestinian child near Azzun town (Qalqilya) and left him hospitalized with contusions.

On 4 June 2020, a group of unknown armed men attacked an Arab Israeli youth with a sharp object in the city of Rishon LeZion, injuring him severely by causing a deep cut on his back, the report claimed that the attack was racially motivated, because he is an Arab.
On 7 June 2020, unidentified armed men attacked the office of a workers union in Gaza city, injuring several civilians.
On 8 June 2020, an Israeli settler attacked and injured a Palestinian young girl in Al Quds - Old City area of Jerusalem (West Bank).
On 14 June 2020, Israeli settlers ran over a Palestinian near Al Quds - Maale Adumim (Al Quds) and left him hospitalized with contusions.
On 15 June 2020, an unidentified group fired a rocket from Gaza at Magan, the rocked landed in an open space and no injuries or damage was reported.
On 16 June 2020, Israeli air forces launched an airstrike targeting unidentified armed Palestinians southeast of Rafah City (Rafah). There were no casualties.
On 22 June 2020, an unidentified assailant threw a grenade at the home of a Palestinian Legislative Council member in Al Jamaa neighborhood in Hebron (Hebron, West Bank). No casualties occurred.

On 23 June 2020, Israeli soldiers shot and killed a Palestinian after he tried to hit a female soldiers with his car at a the 'Container' checkpoint in Al Quds - Abu Dis. His family claim that he was on his way to attend his sister's wedding and lost control of the vehicle.
On 26 June 2020, a rocket fired from Gaza by an unknown group, exploded in Magen, no damage or injuries was done by the explosion.

On 27 June 2020, Israeli police forces arrested two armed Palestinian men after they refused to stop at the Qalandia checkpoint (Al Quds, West Bank). According to Israeli security forces, the two armed Palestinians refused to stop at the checkpoint and then lightly injured two Israeli security officers during the attempted arrest.

On 28 June 2020, Israeli settlers opened fire randomly at Palestinian farmers in Ain Harasha area in Al Mazraah al Qibliyah (Ramallah and Al Bireh) after the farmers removed a tent the settlers had installed on Palestinian agricultural land. There were no fatalities.

On 2 July 2020, Palestinian police forces attacked Palestinians taking part in a welcoming procession of a freed Palestinian detainee in Jenin (Jenin, West Bank). Palestinian forces also seized Hamas flags from the participants and arrested a Palestinian journalist.
On 5 July 2020, an airstrike by Israeli military forces hit a Hamas outpost in Az Zaytun area of Gaza city. Only material damage was done.
On 12 July 2020, Israeli forces opened fire at positions of unidentified armed Palestinians in the east of Khuzaa (Khan Yunis). There were no casualties.
On 14 July 2020, an unidentified Palestinian group fired shots, from a passing vehicle, at an Israeli military point near Itamar settlement (Nablus, West Bank). No casualties occurred.

On 15 July 2020, an unidentified Palestinian group fired shots, from a passing vehicle, at an Israeli military point near Itamar settlement (Nablus, West Bank) for the second night in a row. No casualties occurred.
On 17 July 2020, unidentified Palestinian militant(s) threw pipe bombs at Israeli forces at the entrance of Azzun (Qalqilya, West Bank), twice on the same day. There were no casualties.
On 20 July 2020, Israeli settlers ran over an eight-year-old child near military checkpoint 160 in the Old City of Hebron (Hebron) and left him hospitalized with contusions.
On 24 July 2020, Israeli forces opened fire at positions of unidentified armed Palestinians in he east of Khuzaa (Khan Yunis). There were no casualties.

On 25 July 2020, a Palestinian policeman shot and killed the secretary of Fatah Movement in Balata refugee camp. The shooting started after a dispute over an open shop that should have been closed due to Coronavirus restrictions.
On 29 July 2020, Israeli forces opened fire at positions of unidentified armed Palestinians in the east of Gaza - Az Zaytun (Gaza City). There were no casualties.
On 30 July 2020, Israeli forces opened fire at positions of unidentified armed Palestinians in Khan Yunis city (Khan Yunis). There were no casualties.
On 2 August 2020, unidentified armed Palestinians fired an unknown shell from their positions in the North Gaza district (coded to Jabalya) towards the Green Line. There were no fatalities.
On 3 August 2020, Israeli air forces launched two consecutive airstrikes with three missiles targeting unidentified armed Palestinians west of Khan Yunis city (Khan Yunis). There were no casualties.
On 6 August 2020, an airstrike by Israeli military forces hit a Hamas Movement outpost, causing only material damage, in Bayt Lahya.
On 8 August 2020, an IED balloon, launched by an unknown group in Gaza, exploded in Netivot, there were no injuries as a result of the explosion.
On 9 August 2020, Israeli aircrafts fired one missile targeting unidentified armed Palestinians located north of Bayt Lahya (North Gaza). There were no casualties.
source: Palestine News and Information Agency; PLO Negotiations Affairs Department

event: On 10 August 2020, an unidentified Palestinian group fired incendiary balloons from Gaza that landed in Erez (Ashqelon, HaDarom), causing a fire in open lands.
On 11 August 2020, an airstrike by Israeli military forces hit Hamas positions in Bayt Lahya, in retaliation to an increase in IED balloon attacks on Israel. There were no casualties as a result.
On 12 August 2020, an airstrike by Israeli military forces hit Hamas positions in Gaza city, in retaliation to an increase in IED balloon attacks on Israel. There were no casualties as a result.

On 13 August 2020, Israeli aircrafts launched an airstrike targeting unidentified armed Palestinians located northwest of Gaza city causing material damage to a UNRWA school and 20 nearby houses. There were no casualties.
On 14 August 2020, a drone strike by Israeli military forces hit Hamas positions in Gaza city, in retaliation to an increase in IED balloon attacks on Israel. There were no casualties as a result.
On 15 August 2020, an Israeli settler ran over and killed a Palestinian civilian near the Jabara checkpoint south of Tulkarm (Tulkarm, West Bank).
On 16 August 2020, an airstrike by Israeli military forces hit a Hamas position, in Khan Yunis, causing only material damage.
On 17 August 2020, shelling by Israeli military forces hit a Hamas position, in Khan Yunis, causing only material damage.
On 18 August 2020, an unidentified Palestinian group fired a rocket at Ziqim, the rocket landed in an open area, and no injuries nor damages were done.
On 19 August 2020, a fire broke out, in Beeri, as a result of an incendiary balloon fired from Gaza by an unknown group.
On 20 August 2020, shelling by Israeli military forces hit a Hamas position east of Al Qararah village (Khan Yunis) causing only material damage.
source: Palestine News and Information Agency; PLO Negotiations Affairs Department

event: On 21 August 2020, an airstrike by Israeli military forces hit Hamas positions, in Khan Yunis, resulting in material damages only.
On 22 August 2020, Israeli forces undertook an artillery attack against Hamas positions east of Khuzaa (Khan Yunis). There were no fatalities.
source: Palestine News and Information Agency; PLO Negotiations Affairs Department

event: On 23 August 2020, Israeli forces opened fire at positions of unidentified armed Palestinians north of Bayt Hanun (North Gaza). There were no casualties.
On 24 August 2020, an airstrike by Israeli military forces hit a Hamas position, in Karam Abu Maamar of Rafah district, causing only material damage.
On 25 August 2020, shelling by Israeli military forces hit a Hamas position, in Al Fukhari village, causing only material damage as a result.

On 26 August 2020, an unidentified armed Palestinian, who has a work permit in Israel, stabbed a Haredi rabbi in Petah Tikva city (Petah Tiqwa, HaMerkaz) and killed him. Israeli police forces arrested the Palestinian.
On 27 August 2020, snipers belonging to Hezbollah shot at an Israeli military post, in Menara, there were no casualties.
On 28 August 2020, an airstrike by Israeli military forces hit a Hamas position, in Gaza city, resulting in material damages only.
On 30 August 2020, shelling by Israeli military forces hit a Hamas post, causing only materiel damage, in Al Fukhari.

On 2 September 2020, a Palestinian rammed a car into a checkpoint, injuring 2 soldiers in Zatarah (Salfit, West Bank). Israeli military forces then shot and injured the Palestinian as he got out of the car and approached soldiers with a knife.
On 5 September 2020, an unidentified Palestinian group opened fire at Israeli forces in Jenin - Jenin Camp (Jenin, West Bank). No casualties occurred.
On 6 September 2020, Israeli military forces opened fire at an unknown Palestinian who tried to stab one of the soldiers, in Ariel, no one was injured in the clash.
On 8 September 2020, armed Israeli settlers attacked and injured 3 Palestinian workers, in Berakha village.
On 12 September 2020, an armed Israeli settler opened fire at a Palestinian house, in Hebron city, no one was injured as a result.
On 14 September 2020, an Israeli settler ran over a Palestinian while driving on the main road of Huwwarah (Nablus). The Palestinian was seriously injured and hospitalized.
On 16 September 2020, 3 airstrikes by Israeli military forces hit Hamas positions, in At Tuffah, causing only materiel damage.
On 19 September 2020, an Israeli settler ran over a Palestinian child in Khirbet Samra (Tubas, West Bank), causing injuries to the child.
On 23 September 2020, an IED balloon fired by an unknown group from Gaza, caused a fire in Kissufim.
On 29 September 2020, an unidentified Palestinian group threw a pipe bomb at Israeli forces near the northern entrance of Azzun (Qalqilya, West Bank). There were no casualties.
On 3 October 2020, armed settlers attacked 2 Palestinian civilians, by beating them, in Huwwarah.
On 5 October 2020, an airstrike by Israeli military forces hit a Hamas position, in Rafah, in retaliation to a rocket fired earlier from Gaza. Only material damage was done.

On 9 October 2020, Israeli settlers from the Barakhah settlement opened fire at a Palestine-owned vehicle east of Burin village (Nablus). The settlers detained the owner of the vehicle and handled him to the security of the settlement.
On 14 October 2020, unknown armed men abducted 3 civilians from a Mosque, while they were praying at dawn in Khan Yunis city.
On 16 October 2020, unidentified gunmen clashed with Palestinian forces in Hebron city (Hebron, West Bank). No casualties occurred.
On 20 October 2020, an unidentified Palestinian armed group fired a shell of unknown type from their position in Gaza (Gaza City) towards the Greenline.

On 22 October 2020, unidentified armed Palestinians fired two rockers from the Gaza Strip towards Ashqelon city (HaDarom) and the surrounding areas. Sirens sounded in Ashqelon. One rocket was intercepted, while the other landed in an open area . No property damage or injuries occurred.
On 23 October 2020, Israeli warplanes launched an airstrike on an unidentified Palestinian group location in Deir al Balah province (Deir El Balah, Gaza Strip). No casualties occurred.

On 25 October 2020, an Israeli settler reportedly fired at the car of a Palestinian family near Al Quds-Jabal al Mukabbir neighborhood of Jerusalem (al Quds, West Bank), without resulting in any fatalities nor injuries.
On 28 October 2020, an Israeli settlers ran over and injured 1 Palestinian civilian in Ar Rifaiya village. It is unclear whether this was a deliberate attack or a road accident.

On 29 October 2020, an Israeli settler ran over a Palestinian resident on the main road near the village of Ar Rifaiya (Hebron) east of Yuta. As a result, the civilian was taken to a hospital for treatment.

On 30 October 2020, Israeli military forces engaged in an armed clash with an unidentified armed group in the vicinity of the checkpoint Al Jalamah (Jenin). Israeli military forces then shot at a vehicle carrying 3 children, wounding one.

On 4 November 2020, Israeli military forces shot and killed an off-duty legal advisor with the rank of captain in the Palestinian Police near the Huwwarah checkpoint. The Israeli soldiers also prevented an ambulance from reaching him while he was injured, causing him to bleed out. The Israeli soldiers claimed that the Palestinian drew his weapon and opened fire at them.
source: Arab 48; N12; Palestine News and Information Agency

event: On 6 November 2020, an Israeli settler ran over a Palestinian child near Haris (Salfit, West Bank). The child required medical attention.

On 8 November 2020, Israeli military forces shot and injured 1 Palestinian at the entrance of Mukhayyam al Fawwar Camp, the soldiers claimed he came close to an Israeli military observation tower. The injured Palestinian is from a village near the camp and is a teacher. The Israeli military claimed that the Palestinian tried to carry out a stabbing attack when they shot him in the leg.
source: Palestine News and Information Agency; Xinhua

event: On 9 November 2020, the Israeli Military Forces opened fire towards a site used by an Unidentified Palestinian Armed Group east of Maghazi (Deir El Balah). Based on similar past events, it is assumed that the Israeli Military Forces fired shells towards the position.
On 12 November 2020, Palestinian forces shot 2 Palestinian on a motorcycle in Shuwaykah (Tulkarm, West Bank) hitting them in the leg. Both civilians were hospitalized.
On 15 November 2020, an airstrike by Israeli military forces hit a Hamas position to the south east of Khan Yunis city. The position was destroyed with no reported injuries.
source: Ma'an News Agency; Palestine News and Information Agency

event: On 17 November 2020, an unidentified Palestinian group opened fire at Israeli forces that raided Jaba (Jenin, West Bank). No casualties occurred.
On 20 November 2020, an unidentified Palestinian group threw a pip bomb at Israeli forces positioned at the Qalandia checkpoint (Al Quds, West Bank).
On 21 November 2020, armed Israeli settlers attacked Palestinians in At Tuwani village. 1 Palestinian sustained minor injuries as a result of the attack.
On 22 November 2020, an airstrike by Israeli military forces destroyed a Hamas Movement position in Tal Al Hawa area of Gaza city, causing material damages only.
On 24 November 2020, Israeli settlers attacked 2 Palestinian civilians and sprayed them with pepper spray near Jinsafut village.
